title: A Prayer for the United States of America in the Aftermath of an Act of Violence (14 July 2024)
author: David Abernethy

coauthors.name: David Abernethy
coauthors.bio: David Abernethy practices law in the Philadelphia area and is a member of the Beth Am Israel community in Penn Valley, Pennsylvania.

excerpt: A prayer for the United States of America in the wake of the terrible events in Butler, Pennsylvania on 13 July 2024.  . . .
content:
Contribute a translation Source (English)
Pray for the peace of America.
May those who love her be tranquil,
and the hands of violence stilled within her.
May there be peace in Your political campaigns
and in the pursuit of Your citizensâ€™ causes,
Tranquility in Your public discourse,
in every corner of the land.
For the sake of my friends and my kin,
and for the sake of every American,
those with whom I agree,
and those whom I oppose,
I pray for peace.
For the sake of the house of Adonai our God,
and for the sake of our country,
blessed by Adonai
with the gifts of freedom
and self-government,
I seek the welfare of all.

Based on Psalms 122:6-9, this prayer for civility and domestic peace in the United States of America was offered in the day following the assassination attempt of Donald Trump in Butler, Pennsylvania.
